title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Skills: Collaborative Activity Design in Electronic Environments and Language Learning Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental language acquisition theories and experience using online collaborative tools
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can plan and execute language learning activities on smartphones using learning design tools such as LAMS.

Collaborate with 3-4 peers to produce a 10-page project report and 10-minute presentation on a given language topic (e.g., comparative analysis of Korean-Chinese cultures) and achieve 3.5+/5 on peer/instructor evaluation rubrics
Learners can improve learning outcomes by operating feedback cycles based on formative assessments in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
